title: Federal Databases for Investigative Journalists
description: A list of federal databases useful for investigative journalists, including the Central Personnel Data File, EEO-1 Data File, Environmental Protection Agency compliance data, CDC WONDER, Immigration and Naturalization Service data, Excluded Party List System, Single Audit Database, Bureau of Transportation Statistics Transborder Surface Freight Data, Federal Energy Regulatory Commission's Electric Quarterly Reports, National Fire Incident Reporting System, and TRAC.
